from json import loads

import ase
from ase import Atoms
from ase.optimize import BFGS
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field

from annotations.models.DFTParametersGeneral import DFTParametersGeneral
from annotations.models.StructureMetadata import StructureMetadata

# Functions Code



def structure_from_metadata(
    metadata: StructureMetadata,
) -> Atoms:
    pass



### Key maps

vasp_map = {
    "exchange_correlation_functional": "xc",
    "kpoints": "kpts",
    "pseudopotentials": "pp",
    "energy_cutoff": "encut",
    "energy_convergence_criterion": "ediff",
}

crystal_map = {
    "exchange_correlation_functional": "xc",
    "spin": "spinpol"
    "basis_set": "basis",
    "kpoints": "kpts",
    "ase_otherkeys": "otherkeys"
}

gaussian_map = {
    "exchange_correlation_functional": "xc",
    "basis_set": "basis",
    "ase_otherkeys": "extra"
}

siesta_map = {
    "exchange_correlation_functional": "xc",
    "basis_set": "basis_set",
    "kpoints": "kpts",
}

qe_map = {
    "pseudopotentials": "pseudopotentials",
    "kpoints": "kpts",
    "ase_otherkeys": "input_data",
}

mopac_map = {}

cp2k_map = {
    "basis_set": "basis_set",
    "energy_cutoff": "cutoff",
    "exchange_correlation_functional": "xc",
    "pseudopotentials": "pseudo_potential",
}

dmol_map = {
    "basis_set": "basis",
    "exchange_correlation_functional": "functional",
    "energy_convergence_criterion": "scf_density_convergence",
    "pseudopotentials": "pseudopotential",
    "spin": "spin_polarization",
}

orca_map = {}
gamess_map = {}

key_maps = {"vasp": vasp_map, "crystal": crystal_map, "gaussian": gaussian_map, "siesta": siesta_map, "qe": qe_map, "mopac": mopac_map, "cp2k": cp2k_map, "dmol": dmol_map, "orca": orca_map, "gamess": gamess_map}

### Kwarg Lists

ase_vasp_kwargs = [
    "command",
    "restart",
    "xc",
    "setups",
    "pp",
    "kpts",
    "gamma",
    "reciprocal",
    "charge",
    "prec",
    "encut",
    "ediff",
    "nbands",
    "algo",
    "ismear",
    "sigma",
    "nelm",
]

crystal_kwargs = [
    "restart",
    "xc",
    "spinpol",
    "guess",
    "basis",
    "kpts",
    "isp",
    "smearing",
    "otherkeys"
]

gaussian_kwargs = [
    "label",
    "output_type",
    "method",
    "xc",
    "basis",
    "fitting_basis",
    "charge",
    "mult",
    "basisfile",
    "basis_set",
    "extra",
    "addsec",
    "ioplist",
    "spinlist",
    "zefflist",
    "qmomlist",
    "nmagmlist",
    "znuclist",
    "radnuclearlist",
]

siesta_kwargs = [
    "label",
    "mesh_cutoff",
    "xc",
    "energy_shift",
    "kpts",
    "basis_set",
    "spin",
    "species",
]

qe_kwargs = ["pseudopotentials", "kpts", "input_data", "kspacing", "koffset"]

mopac_kwargs = []

cp2k_kwargs = [
    "auto_write",
    "basis_set",
    "basis_set_file",
    "charge",
    "command",
    "cutoff",
    "debug",
    "force_eval_method",
    "inp",
    "options",
    "max_scf",
    "multiplicity",
    "poisson_solver",
    "potential_file",
    "pseudo_potential",
    "stress_tensor",
    "uks",
    "xc",
    "print_level",
]

dmol_kwargs = [
    "symmetry",
    "spin_polarization",
    "charge",
    "basis",
    "pseudopotential",
    "functional",
    "scf_density_convergence",
]

orca_kwargs = [
    "charge",
    "mult",
    "orcasimpleinput",
    "orcablocks",
]

gamess_kwargs = [
    "label",
    "userscr",
    "basis",
    "ecp",
    "exchange_correlation_functional",
    "basis_set",
]

ase_kwarg_lists = {"vasp": ase_vasp_kwargs, "crytsal": crystal_kwargs, "gaussian": gaussian_kwargs, "siesta": siesta_kwargs, "qe": qe_kwargs, "mopac": mopac_kwargs, "cp2k": cp2k_kwargs, "dmol": dmol_kwargs, "orca": orca_kwargs, "gamess": gamess_kwargs}

### Caluclators

ase_calculators = {
    "vasp": ase.calculators.vasp.Vasp,
    "crystal": ase.calculators.crystal.CRYSTAL,
    "gaussian": ase.calculators.gaussian.Gaussian,
    "siesta": ase.calculators.siesta.Siesta,
    "qe": ase.calculators.espresso.Espresso,
    "mopac": ase.calculators.mopac.MOPAC,
    "cp2k": ase.calculators.cp2k.CP2K,
    "dmol": ase.calculators.dmol.DMol3,
    "orca": ase.calculators.orca.ORCA,
    "gamess": ase.calculators.gamess_us.GAMESSUS,
}


### Setup Functions


def vasp_setup(input_kwargs: dict, dft_parameters: dict) -> dict:
    hubbard_U_dict = dft_parameters.get("hubbard_U")
    if hubbard_U_dict is not None:
        ldau_luj = {}
        for element, u_value in hubbard_U_dict.items():
            ldau_luj[element] = {"L": 2, "U": u_value, "J": 0}

        ldau_params = {
            "LDAU": True,
            "LDAUTYPE": 2,
            "LDAUL": [ldau_luj[element]["L"] for element in hubbard_U_dict.keys()],
            "LDAUU": [ldau_luj[element]["U"] for element in hubbard_U_dict.keys()],
            "LDAUJ": [ldau_luj[element]["J"] for element in hubbard_U_dict.keys()],
        }

        input_kwargs = {**input_kwargs, **ldau_params}

    if dft_parameters.get("relaxed_nuclei"):
        input_kwargs["isif"] = 2

        if dft_parameters.get("relaxed_unit_cell"):
            input_kwargs["isif"] = 3

    else:
        input_kwargs["ibrion"] = -1

    return input_kwargs


def siesta_setup(input_kwargs: dict, dft_parameters: dict) -> dict:
    manually_set_spin = dft_parameters.get("other_information").get("spin") 
    if manually_set_spin is not None:
        input_kwargs["spin"] = manually_set_spin
    elif dft_parameters.get("spin"):
        input_kwargs["spin"] = "spin-orbit"
    else:
        input_kwargs["spin"] = "non-polarized"

    return input_kwargs


def qe_setup(input_kwargs: dict, dft_parameters: dict) -> dict:
    input_data = input_kwargs.get("input_data")
    if input_data is None:
        input_data = {}

    input_data["system"] = {
        'ecutwfc': dft_parameters.get("energy_cutoff"),
        'input_dft': dft_parameters.get("exchange_correlation_functional"),
    }
    input_data["control"] = {"convergence_threshold": dft_parameters.get("energy_convergence_criterion")}

    if dft_parameters.get("hubbard_U") is not None:
        input_data["system"]["Hubbard_U"] = dft_parameters.get("hubbard_U")
        input_data["system"]["lda_plus_u"] = True

    if dft_parameters.get("spin"):
        input_data["system"]["nspin"] = 2

    input_kwargs["input_data"] = input_data

    return input_kwargs
        

def gamess_setup(input_kwargs: dict, dft_parameters: dict) -> dict:
    contrl = {"dfttyp": dft_parameters["exchange_correlation_functional"]}
    basis = {"gbasis": dft_parameters["basis_set"]}
    if dft_parameters.get("tddft") is not None:
        contrl["tddft"] = dft_parameters["tddft"]
    
    input_kwargs = {"contrl": contrl, "basis": basis, **input_kwargs}

    return input_kwargs


setup_functions = {"vasp": vasp_setup, "siesta": siesta_setup, "qe": qe_setup, "gamess": gamess_setup}


### General Code

JSON_FIELDS = ["kpoints", "hubbard_U", "ase_otherkeys", "other_information"]


def dft_general(atoms: Atoms, dft_parameters: DFTParametersGeneral):
    # Convert from pydantic to dict
    dft_dict = dft_parameters.dict()

    # Convert json strings to dict
    for field_name in JSON_FIELDS:
        if field_name in dft_parameters.keys():
            dft_dict[field_name] = loads(dft_parameters[field_name])

    # Check to make sure the DFT code is supported by this function
    code = dft_dict.get("code")
    if (
        code is None
        or code not in key_maps
        or code not in ase_kwarg_lists
        or code not in ase_calculators
    ):
        key_map_codes = set(key_maps.keys())
        ase_kwarg_codes = set(ase_kwarg_lists.keys())
        ase_calculator_codes = set(ase_calculators.keys())
        supported_codes = key_map_codes.intersection(ase_calculator_codes).intersection(
            ase_kwarg_codes
        )
        raise ValueError(
            f"DFT code name {code} is not suppported yet. Supported codes are: {str(supported_codes)}"
        )

    # Replace general keys with code-specific keys.
    key_map = key_maps[code]
    specific_dft_dict = {}
    for general_key_name, value in key_map.items():
        specific_key_name = key_map.get(general_key_name)
        if specific_key_name is None:
            specific_dft_dict[general_key_name] = value
        else:
            specific_dft_dict[specific_key_name] = value

    # Prepare the inputs to the ASE calculator's __init__ by only keeping keys that the ASE calculator will accept as kwargs
    kwarg_list = ase_kwarg_lists[code]
    specific_kwarg_input_dict = {
        k: v
        for k, v in specific_dft_dict.items()
        if k in kwarg_list
    }

    # If dft-code-specific kwargs were entered into the sheet, include them here
    additional_kwargs = dft_dict.get("other_information")
    if additional_kwargs is not None:
        specific_kwarg_input_dict = {**specific_kwarg_input_dict, **additional_kwargs}

    # If there is any dft-code-specific setup for the inputs dictionary remaining, do it here
    setup_function = setup_functions.get("code")
    if setup_function is not None:
        modified_input_dict = setup_function(
            specific_kwarg_input_dict, specific_dft_dict
        )
    else:
        modified_input_dict = specific_kwarg_input_dict

    # Define and set the calculator
    calculator = ase_calculators[code]
    calc = calculator(**modified_input_dict)
    atoms.set_calculator(calc)

    # Run DFT
    if dft_dict.get("relaxed_unit_cell"):
        dyn = BFGS(atoms)
        dyn.run(dft_dict.get("force_convergence_criterion"))
    else:
        atoms.get_potential_energy()

    return atoms


def atomic_charges_analysis(atoms: Atoms) -> dict:
    pass


def dipole_analysis(atoms: Atoms) -> dict:
    pass


def second_hyperpolarizability_analysis(atoms: Atoms) -> dict:
    pass


def hirshfeld_surface_analysis(atoms: Atoms) -> dict:
    pass
def create_list(*args) -> list:
    return [arg for arg in args]


# Inputs Code



class DFTParametersGeneral(BaseModel):
    id: str | None
    code: str | None
    exchange_correlation_functional: str | None = Field(..., alias="functional")
    kpoints: str | None = Field(..., alias="k-points")
    pseudopotentials: str | None
    basis_set: str | None
    energy_cutoff: float | None
    force_convergence_criterion: float | None = Field(..., alias="force_convergence")
    energy_convergence_criterion: float | None = Field(..., alias="energy_convergence")
    relaxed_nuclei: bool | None
    relaxed_unit_cell: bool | None
    spin: bool | None
    hubbard_U: str | None
    ase_otherkeys: str | None
    other_information: str | None
    notes: str | None



class StructureMetadataGeneral(BaseModel):
    id: str | None
    common_name: str | None
    scientific_name: str | None
    type: str | None
    composition: str | None
    crystal_or_isolated: str | None
    vacuum: str | None
    supercell: str | None
    cas_number: str | None
    lattice_parameters: str | None
    space_group: str | None
    mp_id: str | None
    isomer: str | None
    cell_size: str | None
    miller_indices: str | None
    crystal_structure: str | None
    additional_information: str | None

structure_metadata_cad = StructureMetadataGeneral.parse_raw('{"common_name": NaN, "scientific_name": "(E)-pent-2-enoic acid", "type": "isolated molecule", "composition": "C5H8O2", "crystal_or_isolated": "molecule", "vacuum": NaN, "supercell": NaN, "cell_size": NaN, "cas_number": NaN, "lattice_parameters": NaN, "space_group": NaN, "mp_id": NaN, "isomer": NaN, "miller_indices": NaN, "crystal_structure": NaN, "additional_information": "a carboxilic acid derivative"}')

dft_params_54 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": NaN, "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_55 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "MP2", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": NaN, "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_56 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": NaN, "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_57 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Chloroform\"}", "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_58 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Dichloromethane\"}", "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_59 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Acetone\"}", "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_60 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Ethanol\"}", "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_61 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Methanol\"}", "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_62 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Dimethyl\"}", "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_63 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Water\"}", "notes": NaN}')

# Execution Code

atoms_cad = structure_from_metadata(structure_metadata_cad)
parameters = create_list(dft_params_57, dft_params_58, dft_params_59, dft_params_60, dft_params_61, dft_params_62, dft_params_63)
cad_results_1 = dft_general(atoms_cad, dft_params_54)
cad_results_2 = dft_general(atoms_cad, dft_params_55)
cad_results_3 = dft_general(atoms_cad, dft_params_56)
relaxed_atoms_cad = []
for parameters_entry in parameters:
    relaxed_atoms_cad_entry = dft_general(atoms_cad, parameters_entry)
    relaxed_atoms_cad.append(relaxed_atoms_cad_entry)

hirshfeld_surface = hirshfeld_surface_analysis(cad_results_1)
dipoles = dipole_analysis(cad_results_2)
charges = atomic_charges_analysis(cad_results_2)
second_hyperpolarizability = second_hyperpolarizability_analysis(cad_results_3)
dipoles_with_solvent = []
for relaxed_atoms_cad_entry in relaxed_atoms_cad:
    dipoles_with_solvent_entry = dipole_analysis(relaxed_atoms_cad_entry)
    dipoles_with_solvent.append(dipoles_with_solvent_entry)

second_hyperpolarizability_with_solvent = []
for relaxed_atoms_cad_entry in relaxed_atoms_cad:
    second_hyperpolarizability_with_solvent_entry = second_hyperpolarizability_analysis(relaxed_atoms_cad_entry)
    second_hyperpolarizability_with_solvent.append(second_hyperpolarizability_with_solvent_entry)

from ase import Atoms
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field

from annotations.functions.dft_general import dft_general
from annotations.models.StructureMetadata import StructureMetadata

# Functions Code



def structure_from_metadata(
    metadata: StructureMetadata,
) -> Atoms:
    pass


def atomic_charges_analysis(atoms: Atoms) -> dict:
    pass
def create_list(*args) -> list:
    return [arg for arg in args]


def second_hyperpolarizability_analysis(atoms: Atoms) -> dict:
    pass



def dipole_analysis(atoms: Atoms) -> dict:
    pass


def hirshfeld_surface_analysis(atoms: Atoms) -> dict:
    pass


# Inputs Code



class DFTParametersGeneral(BaseModel):
    id: str | None
    code: str | None
    exchange_correlation_functional: str | None = Field(..., alias="functional")
    kpoints: str | None = Field(..., alias="k-points")
    pseudopotentials: str | None
    basis_set: str | None
    energy_cutoff: float | None
    force_convergence_criterion: float | None = Field(..., alias="force_convergence")
    energy_convergence_criterion: float | None = Field(..., alias="energy_convergence")
    relaxed_nuclei: bool | None
    relaxed_unit_cell: bool | None
    spin: bool | None
    hubbard_U: str | None
    ase_otherkeys: str | None
    other_information: str | None
    notes: str | None



class StructureMetadataGeneral(BaseModel):
    id: str | None
    common_name: str | None
    scientific_name: str | None
    type: str | None
    composition: str | None
    crystal_or_isolated: str | None
    vacuum: str | None
    supercell: str | None
    cas_number: str | None
    lattice_parameters: str | None
    space_group: str | None
    mp_id: str | None
    isomer: str | None
    cell_size: str | None
    miller_indices: str | None
    crystal_structure: str | None
    additional_information: str | None

structure_metadata_cad = StructureMetadataGeneral.parse_raw('{"common_name": NaN, "scientific_name": "(E)-pent-2-enoic acid", "type": "isolated molecule", "composition": "C5H8O2", "crystal_or_isolated": "molecule", "vacuum": NaN, "supercell": NaN, "cell_size": NaN, "cas_number": NaN, "lattice_parameters": NaN, "space_group": NaN, "mp_id": NaN, "isomer": NaN, "miller_indices": NaN, "crystal_structure": NaN, "additional_information": "a carboxilic acid derivative"}')

dft_params_54 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": NaN, "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_60 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Ethanol\"}", "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_61 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Methanol\"}", "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_62 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Dimethyl\"}", "notes": NaN}')

dft_params_63 = DFTParametersGeneral.parse_raw('{"software": "gaussian", "functional": "CAM-B3LYP", "k-points": NaN, "pseudopotentials": NaN, "basis_set": "6-311++G(d,p)", "energy_cutoff": NaN, "force_convergence": NaN, "energy_convergence": NaN, "relaxed_nuclei": NaN, "relaxed_unit_cell": NaN, "spin": NaN, "hubbard_U": NaN, "ase_otherkeys": NaN, "other_information": "{\"scrf\": \"Solvent=Water\"}", "notes": NaN}')

# Execution Code

atoms_cad = structure_from_metadata(structure_metadata_cad)
parameters = create_list(dft_params_57, dft_params_58, dft_params_59, dft_params_60, dft_params_61, dft_params_62, dft_params_63)
cad_results_1 = dft_general(atoms_cad, dft_params_54)
cad_results_2 = dft_general(atoms_cad, dft_params_55)
cad_results_3 = dft_general(atoms_cad, dft_params_56)
relaxed_atoms_cad = []
for parameters_entry in parameters:
    relaxed_atoms_cad_entry = dft_general(atoms_cad, parameters_entry)
    relaxed_atoms_cad.append(relaxed_atoms_cad_entry)

hirshfeld_surface = hirshfeld_surface_analysis(cad_results_1)
dipoles = dipole_analysis(cad_results_2)
charges = atomic_charges_analysis(cad_results_2)
second_hyperpolarizability = second_hyperpolarizability_analysis(cad_results_3)
dipoles_with_solvent = []
for relaxed_atoms_cad_entry in relaxed_atoms_cad:
    dipoles_with_solvent_entry = dipole_analysis(relaxed_atoms_cad_entry)
    dipoles_with_solvent.append(dipoles_with_solvent_entry)

second_hyperpolarizability_with_solvent = []
for relaxed_atoms_cad_entry in relaxed_atoms_cad:
    second_hyperpolarizability_with_solvent_entry = second_hyperpolarizability_analysis(relaxed_atoms_cad_entry)
    second_hyperpolarizability_with_solvent.append(second_hyperpolarizability_with_solvent_entry)
